team_gold_zork

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • team_gold_zork.Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows for the creation and storage of rooms.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Room

        public Room(java.util.Scanner s,
            Dungeon d,
            boolean initState)
     throws NoRoomException,
            NoItemException
        This constructs a Room object, as well as the items in it.
        Parameters:
        s - the Scanner reading a bork file.
        d - the Dungeon the room is in.
        initState - whether the room should be restored or reset.
        Throws:
        NoRoomException - if the room description has ended.
        NoItemException - if an item in the room's contents is invalid.

      • Room

        Room(java.lang.String title)
        This constructs a Room object with its name.
        Parameters:
        title - the name of the Room object.

                           Dungeon d)
                    throws NoItemException
        This helper method stores the items to the room given a list of contents.
        Parameters:
        contents - the list of items in the room.
        d - the Dungeon the items are in.
        Throws:
        NoItemException - if an item in the room is not valid.

        Returns:

        Throws:

      • indexOf

        private int indexOf(java.lang.String dir)
        This helper method determines the index of an Exit object in the ArrayList exits.
        Parameters:
        dir - the desired direction.
        Returns:
        the index of the Exit with the desired direction (-1 for not found).

        exit - the exit to be added to the Room.

        Returns:

      • storeState

        void storeState(java.io.PrintWriter w)
        Stores the state of the room to a .sav file.
        Parameters:
        w - the PrintWriter for outputting to a .sav file.

      • restoreState

        void restoreState(java.util.Scanner s,
                  Dungeon d)
           throws IllegalSaveFormatException
        Restores the state of the room, including items, from a .sav file.
        Parameters:
        s - the Scanner reading the .sav file.
        d - the Dungeon the room is in.
        Throws:
        IllegalSaveFormatException - if the room description contains invalid contents.
